features: A Stationery Solution - Experience the convenience of our Stationery Set with Envelopes, offering a comprehensive solution for all your letter writing endeavors.
Class Black Border Style - Elevate your letter writing experience with our exquisite Stationery Set. The classic design lends an air of sophistication.
Reliable Materials - Immerse yourself in the luxury of our Stationery Writing Kit. Crafted from superior 100gsm stationery paper and 120gsm envelopes, each sheet and envelope exudes quality.

Classic Size - Rediscover the pleasure of classic-sized letter paper with our 7.25x10.2-inch sheets. The vintage-inspired design, combined with modern elegance, makes our Stationery Writing Kit a addition to your stationary collection.

Applicable to Multiple Scenarios - This Stationery Set with Envelopes is not just a letter writing kit; it's a versatile companion for all occasions. From heartfelt letters to professional communications, the set is designed to meet the diverse needs of your stationary requirements.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Our brand is dedicated to delivering an unparalleled paper experience for our valued customers. We understand the importance of a seamless and enjoyable writing process, and our commitment is to ensure that you can express yourself without any hindrance. Embrace the joy of writing with our brand, where excellence meets the pure pleasure of putting pen to paper.

XXINMOH 72 Pieces High Quality Stationery Set with Envelopes XXINMOH presents a premium 72-piece stationery set with envelopes, designed to elevate your correspondence experience. Package: 48 x Stationery Papers, 24 x EnvelopesStyle: Black Border DesignTips: Include Moistenable Glue Seal
Size Stationery: 7.25 x 10.2 in (21 x 14.5 cm) Envelope: 7.6 x 4 in (19.4 x 10 cm)

Ecru Paper Sheets and Envelopes Discover the timeless elegance of Ecru Paper Sheets and Envelopes—a collection designed to bring sophistication to your correspondence. Our meticulously chosen ecru hue exudes a classic and refined charm, setting the perfect tone for your handwritten expressions. 100 GSM Stationery Paper, 120 GSM Envelopes Introducing our 100 GSM Stationery Paper and 120 GSM Envelopes—a combination that brings together premium quality and luxurious aesthetics. Immerse yourself in the indulgent experience of writing on finely weighted 100 GSM stationery paper, providing a perfect balance of substance and elegance. Create Custom Party Invitations & Thank You Notes Create lasting impressions with custom invitations and thank you notes that go beyond the ordinary. Start designing your personalized party stationery today and let your creativity shine!

Be Expressive Join us in celebrating the beauty of expression. Be bold, be imaginative, and let your creativity shine. In a world full of possibilities, let your unique colors paint the canvas of your life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice stationary set!
reviews.reviewText: I really like this stationary set.Whether to catch up on your correspondence, something that may have been considered something to do in a past time, there are still many of us that thoroughly enjoy writing letters.This set is also great got a short note or letter to someone nearby or far, or even for a professional, or elegant way of writing something to someone.Each example is perfect in its own way!The paper is perfect and not too thick and not too lightweight.It can be folded three times beautifully to fit on the envelope.The envelope sticks well and it looks so elegant, classic and professional.I love these. I have always loved writing since I was a child and this is a great set to continue to write to family, friends, neighbors, or just a special note to someone.The black design on the letter pages looks classy yet simple and adds elegance.The envelopes are perfect.I have already used several of these to write extended holiday wishes for letters to loved ones and it worked out perfectly.Beautiful set and I definitely would suggest this set to have so you can write a quick note or letter for professional reasons, or simply to reach out to anyone for any reason.The design and paper stock make it a beautiful way to address anyone.I would get these again and they are absolutely perfect to have on hand, so I can always have a nice stationary set to write anyone I need to.Beautiful design. Great paper, envelope sticks well and you can't see what's written through envelope.This product exceeded my expectations.Love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars All in One Stationary Kit
reviews.reviewText: The 72-Piece Stationery Set with Envelopes is a comprehensive and delightful collection that brings a touch of elegance to your correspondence, making it an excellent choice for personal and professional use.This set includes a diverse array of stationery items, providing everything you need for a well-rounded writing experience. From letterheads to note cards, envelopes, and more, each piece is thoughtfully designed to create a cohesive and sophisticated stationery ensemble.The quality of the materials is evident in the smooth texture of the paper and the durability of the envelopes. The set exudes a sense of luxury, making it suitable for special occasions, professional communication, or simply expressing your thoughts with style.The variety in the set allows for versatility in your correspondence. Whether you're sending formal letters, heartfelt notes, or expressing gratitude, this set has you covered. The uniformity in design across the pieces adds a touch of consistency, enhancing the overall aesthetic appeal.The generous quantity of 72 pieces ensures that you have an ample supply for various occasions and correspondence needs. The set's completeness eliminates the need to mix and match stationery items, providing a hassle-free and cohesive solution.In conclusion, the 72-Piece Stationery Set with Envelopes stands out as a versatile and elegant collection for all your writing needs. Its thoughtful design, quality materials, and comprehensive variety make it a delightful stationery set that adds a touch of sophistication to your correspondence.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Add an old-school flair!
reviews.reviewText: There are times that a store-bought card or email note just isn't right. So it's times like that when a handwritten (or typed!) note on some nice stationary adds that personal touch that gets noticed. Sad to say, this sort of thing is a dying art.But for old throwback boomers like yours truly, who learned cursive in the 3rd grade, having some stationary on hand is a good thing. For the price, this is a nice set. Not super duper classy and elegant but nice. There are enough sheets for an average of two pages per envelope. The color and border are not overwhelming.Only issue, and I guess at this price it shouldn't be an issue, is the paper itself. As other reviewers have noted (and I concur), the icing on the cake would have been even a slight texture to the paper. Nothing too aggressive since some folks may want to run it through a printer. But more than the smooth "copy paper" stock.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don’t buy this. Doesn’t come with envelopes as advertised
reviews.reviewText: Did not come with 25 envelopes as advertised. Just paper

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Short of pricey, personalized stationery, these are pretty nice. Definitely a step up for generic writing paper and envelopes. (Do yourself a favor and use a decent pen when writing.)Your mom or your significant other will enjoy getting a letter from you, hand written on good stationery. Letter writing should not become a lost art.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smooth ecru paper and envelopes that are enjoyable to write on.
reviews.reviewText: I had determined to write more letters to my grandkids so was happy to test this set out. The sheets are the perfect size--not printer paper size but larger than memo size. I found that I can lay a sheet on top of a lined pad of paper and the stationery is just the right weight that I can see the lines beneath and keep my writing straight. :-) The envelopes are a little bit heavier and look very classy. [NOTE: some pictures on the product page make it appear that the gummed side of the envelope is orange--it is not.] VERY inexpensive for the set. The set arrived in perfect condition which is a plus--no creases or bent pieces. I wish I had the option to purchase with different color borders. Recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple classically styled and elegant stationary
reviews.reviewText: The stationery set is exactly what I need. It's simple quality, well-designed, and attractive stationery. Both the envelopes and paper are heavy paper, an indication of good quality. Although basic, I like the appealing look of the border style. Certainly, it's a versatile stationery that could meet business or personal correspondence requirements. I had forgotten the true size of a standard writing kit that I and many others have been accustomed to growing up. This nice set has been a good reminder of conformity to business standards. I think anyone receiving a letter/note from written on this elegant traditional paper would be impressed.
